column4: hey, what's the minimum amoutn of RAM that ubuntu server will install/work under? anyone know?
i think 64 is what is listed under minimal specs
that depends what you are looking to do, but for most people it should
ok... arch failed becuase it loaded everything into RAM and quickly died
and what's the lowest recomeanded CPU speed?
shold i not even try isntalling? :P
you can try, but you may be waiting a long time for it to install
normal ubuntu failed (not even boot), and arch booted to prompt but ran out of RAM installing
i guess this wouldn't work as a good file server then :P
normal ubuntu uses a GUI, that needs lots of memory
ubuntu server shouldent have those kind of problems
the install for ubuntu server is text based
k, i'll try installing, but how well would it perform? would it be usable?
it will be slow for installing, but after that it shouldent be so bad
